import React from 'react'; const Rating = (props) => { const { value, text, color } = props; return (
= 1 ? 'fas fa-star' : value >= 0.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star' } > = 2 ? 'fas fa-star' : value >= 1.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star' } > = 3 ? 'fas fa-star' : value >= 2.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star' } > = 4 ? 'fas fa-star' : value >= 3.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star' } > = 5 ? 'fas fa-star' : value >= 4.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star' } > {text} {(color = 'red')}
); }; export default Rating;
